tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flight_paths (
	drone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	flight_id UUID,
	start_location VARCHAR,
	end_location VARCHAR,
	flight_date TIMESTAMP,
	duration INTERVAL,
	telemetry_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_id INT,
    telemetry_time TIMESTAMP,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    altitude DECIMAL,
    speed DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_flight_id FOREIGN KEY(flight_id) REFERENCES drone_flight_paths(flight_id)
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    altitude INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    telemetry_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    altitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    speed DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE map_coordinates (
    coord_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    telemetry_id INT,
    coord_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_paths (
  path_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  start_latitude DOUBLE,
  start_longitude DOUBLE,
  end_latitude DOUBLE,
  end_longitude DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
  telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  path_id INT,
  time_stamp TIMESTAMP,
  speed FLOAT,
  altitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  log_datetime DATETIME,
  log_details VARCHAR(255)
);
